mapper.sql: selection_id, contract_price_id, section_type, upper_limit, lower_limit, price, selection_status
mapper.select:
select
from contract_section_price where contract_price_id = #{contractPriceId} and #{value} between upper_limit and lower_limit order by selection_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into contract_section_price (selection_id, contract_price_id, section_type, upper_limit, lower_limit, price, selection_status) values (#{selectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractPriceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upperLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lowerLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{selectionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
